title: Creamy Tuscan Chicken
description: A creamy, sun-dried tomato and spinach chicken dish that's ready in under 30 minutes. Perfect for a quick weeknight dinner that tastes like it came from a restaurant.
steps: Season chicken pieces with salt and pepper. Heat 1 tablespoon olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Cook chicken in batches until golden brown and cooked through, about 5-7 minutes per batch. Transfer to a plate and set aside.
Add remaining olive oil and butter to the same skillet. Add onion and cook for 3-4 minutes until softened.
Add garlic and cook for 30 seconds until fragrant.
Pour in chicken broth and scrape up any browned bits from the bottom of the pan.
Reduce heat to medium-low and stir in heavy cream and Parmesan cheese. Simmer for 2-3 minutes until sauce begins to thicken.
Add sun-dried tomatoes and spinach. Cook for 2-3 minutes until spinach is wilted.
Return chicken to the skillet and stir to coat with sauce. Cook for 2-3 minutes until heated through.
Serve hot over pasta, rice, or with crusty bread. Garnish with additional Parmesan cheese if desired.
